entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
